stripped_text: When the Runner encounters Data Raven, he or she must either take 1 tag or end the run. Hosted power counter: Give the Runner 1 tag. Subroutine Trace 3 If successful, place 1 power counter on Data Raven.
text: When the Runner encounters Data Raven, he or she must either take 1 tag or end the run. Hosted power counter: Give the Runner 1 tag. [subroutine] Trace 3 If successful, place 1 power counter on Data Raven.
title: Data Raven
